alert.note: Alert for Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Siskiyou County through 415 PM PDT... At 344 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Somes Bar, or 13 miles northeast of Orleans, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and up to pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Siskiyou County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
